with users as ( select ac.*, sf.role, IF(role = 1, sh.br_no, '') as br_no, sf.approval_st, sh.shop_nm from tb_account ac left outer join tb_shop sh on sh.shop_id=ac.curr_shop_id left outer join tb_staff sf on sf.staff_id=ac.id and sf.shop_id=sh.shop_id where user_st=#{userSt} ), search as ( select json_arrayagg(json_object( 'name',name, 'pfp',pfp, 'email',email, 'tel',tel, 'br_no',br_no, 'regi_dt',date_format(regi_dt, '%Y-%m-%d'), 'last_login_dt',last_login_dt, 'role',role, 'approval_st',approval_st, 'shop_nm',shop_nm )) from users where
( name like '%${keyword}%' or tel like '%${keyword}%' or email like '%${keyword}%' or br_no like '%${keyword}%' ) and
1=1 )
select ( select count(*) from users ) as total_cnt, ( select * from search ) as list

select id, regi_dt from tb_account where
tel = #{tel} and
email = #{email} and
1=1

WITH tb as ( SELECT sf.staff_id as id, sf.role, ac.name, ac.tel, sf.start_dt, ac.curr_shop_id as shop_id, sf.approval_st from tb_staff sf left outer join tb_account ac on ac.id = sf.staff_id where shop_id = #{currShopId} )
SELECT * from tb WHERE
( name like '%${keyword}%' or tel like '%${keyword}%' ) and
1=1
select json_objectagg( sf.staff_id, ac.name ) from tb_staff sf left outer join tb_account ac on ac.id=sf.staff_id where shop_id=#{currShopId} and approval_st = 1
SELECT ( SELECT name FROM tb_account WHERE id=staff_id ) as name from tb_staff where shop_id = #{currShopId} and approval_st=1
SELECT ac.name, ac.user_st, sf.role, sf.approval_st from tb_staff sf left outer join tb_account ac on ac.id = sf.staff_id where shop_id = #{shopId}
SELECT tel, email FROM tb_account WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT ( select IFNULL(sf.approval_st, false) from tb_staff sf where sf.staff_id = id and sf.shop_id = curr_shop_id ) as approval_st FROM tb_account where id=#{id}
SELECT id AS user_id, name AS user_nm, pfp FROM tb_account WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_account SET user_st=1 WHERE user_st = 0 AND DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, last_login_dt) > #{date};
UPDATE tb_account SET last_login_dt=NOW(), user_st=0 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ac.id, ac.pwd, ( select IFNULL(sf.role, -1) from tb_staff sf where ac.curr_shop_id = sf.shop_id and ac.id = sf.staff_id ) as role from tb_account ac where id=#{userId}

SELECT ac.id, ac.name, ac.tel, ac.nickname, ac.pfp, ac.curr_shop_id, ( select IFNULL(sf.role, -1) from tb_staff sf where sf.shop_id = ac.curr_shop_id and sf.staff_id = ac.id ) as role, sh.shop_nm, sh.shop_addr, sh.provider, ( select IF(count(*), IFNULL(( select sf2.approval_st from tb_staff sf2 where sf2.shop_id=ac.curr_shop_id and sf2.staff_id=ac.id ),0), -1) from tb_staff sf where sf.staff_id=ac.id ) as approval_st FROM tb_account ac LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_shop sh on sh.shop_id=ac.curr_shop_id WHERE id = #{userId}

id=#{id} and
